descriptionHTML:
Personal Security camera for your Android Wear Watch. Stream video from your phone to your Watch instantly. No setup required!

* Leave your phone in another room and see what people/pets are doing.
* Get vibrate alerts when movement is detected.
* Capture still images manually or automatically.
* Use as a baby monitor.

Features:
- Front and Back camera support.
- Motion Detection.
- Works when phone is locked.
- Start and stop camera app from your watch.
- Take photos by tapping the watch face.
- Auto-capture mode.
- Auto screen time-out to save watch battery.
- Works as a security camera even without an Android Wear Watch.
- Built in image browser to view and share your photos.

Please make sure you have the latest 'Android Wear' app and Watch System updates installed.

*** 48 hour 'peace of mind' refund available. Just email us within 48 hours of purchase for a full refund ***

Let us know via email if you want any new features or find any bugs.

Please rate this app if you like it!


Credits: commons.wikimedia.org/wiki/File:HAL9000.svg
comments: Ray Excellent! Like the ability to swap between front camera and rear
Does what it says and works well but could really do with sound support to be used as a monitor
App for moto 360 The app would not let me open it without my phone haveing to be unlocked first. Totally ruined it. Besides that not a bad app
